DOC.brief_summary: This study compare pharmacokinetics ( PK ) assess safety delayed-release metformin ( Met DR , EFB0027 ) two dosage level , immediate-release metformin ( Met IR , ETB0015 ) , extended-release metformin ( Met XR , ETB0014 ) healthy subject .
DOC.brief_title: Assessing PK Met DR , Met IR , Met XR Healthy Subjects

Ability understand willingness adhere protocol requirement 1 . Had clinically significant medical condition judge investigator could potentially affect study participation and/or personal wellbeing , include limited following condition : 1 . Hepatic disease 2 . Gastrointestinal disease 3 . Endocrine disorder ( include diabetes impair glucose tolerance ) 4 . Cardiovascular disease 5 . Central nervous system diseases 6 . Psychiatric neurological disorder 7 . Organ transplantation 8 . Chronic acute infection 9 . Orthostatic hypotension , faint spell blackouts 10 . Allergy hypersensitivity 2 . Had chronic disease require medication adjust past 90 day ( subject could take acute intermittent overthecounter medication Tylenol , need ) 3 . Had major surgery kind within 6 month Visit 1 ( Screening ) 4 . Had history > 6 kg weight change within 3 month Visit 1 ( Screening ) 5 . Had clinical laboratory test ( clinical chemistry , hematology , urinalysis ) abnormality judge investigator clinically significant Visit 1 ( Screening ) 6 . Had physical , psychological , historical finding , investigator 's opinion , would make subject unsuitable study 7 .
